title: Establish a set fee reward for GHST holders
body:
GHST holders will be rewarded with a percentage of the protocols transactions fees as users open portals, spend money for consumables, interact with mini-games, and so on. 

What percentage of the transaction fees should GHST holders receive?
author: 0x6EDB3471D4e0A90a785d3Fb8ebb81fE32c6C25DF
